frontmatter.title: Information Technology Service Desk Team Lead

node.html:
• Led a team of 10-13 dedicated members, providing guidance, addressing questions, and offering coaching to enhance performance.
  • Managed team responsibilities, ensuring tasks were completed efficiently and meeting high-quality standards.
  • Proudly achieved consistent top rankings, often securing the rank 1 or 2 position within the organization.
  • Contributed to a positive team culture, fostering collaboration and excellence in service delivery.
tasks: - "Started my professional journey through TCS's Initial Learning Program (ILP) as a trainee, acquiring essential knowledge and foundational skills in my field."

frontmatter.title: Information Technology Service Desk L2 Agent

node.html:
• Promoted to the role of L2 ITSD Agent, taking on increased responsibilities in managing tickets assigned by L1 ITSD Agents.
  • Provided assistance as needed, ensuring efficient resolution of technical issues and maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction.

frontmatter.title: Information Technology Service Desk Team L1 Agent

node.html: • Assumed the role of ITSD L1 Agent, handling incoming calls and providing support to valued customers."
